Title: Court - State Vs. A Nobody
Writer: Ram Jagadeesh, Vamsidhar Sirigiri, Karthikeya Sreenivass
Actors: Priyadarshi Pulikonda, Harsh Roshan, Rajasekhar Aningi
Plot: A passionate defense attorney fights against prejudice and corruption in the justice system while representing a teenage client wrongly presumed guilty of a serious crime.
